__e: My name is Robbie, What's your name?
Do you know yet if we can go to dinner with Robbie and Annie?
You be a good boy, Robbie, and take care of Mom and your baby sister while Daddy's gone.
I tell you, Robbie, I'd challenge them on every level.
I told you before, Robbie, I will not let them kill you.
P.S., Robbie, I'm sending you something just to keep my record clear about never breaking a promise to you.
